item.title: Plotting a ggtree and ggplots side by side
item.description: Plotting phylogenies and associated data side by side is a good way to explore evolutionary patterns in your data. In this post I will describe my approach for creating such plots in R using ggplot, ggtree, and patchwork.

item.title: Blogging with Emacs Org-Mode and Jekyll
item.description: I've been thinking about getting my own blog up for more than a while now, and finally made it happen! This is is my first post, and it will cover the basics steps I took to get this site up and running.
